pages.text:
About Us
Luxury Hotels & Resorts That Add A Contemporary Twist To The Timeless
Opal Collection is a premier assortment of luxury hotels and resorts among the most sought after destinations in the eastern United States.
What makes a perfect vacation? Do you long for hiking through national parks, golfing along a glimmering ocean, or sinking your toes into the soft, white sand of a private beach? Whatever you dream of, the Opal Collection’s luxury hotels and resorts will help you refresh, unwind, and connect with the authentic character of your destination. No two Opal properties are the same, but the exceptional service and tailored experience at each will set the stage for getaways you’ll never forget.
View Our Hotels & Resorts
Escape to a getaway as unique as you are
Just like the effervescent qualities of an Opal gemstone, each luxury hotel and resort in the Opal Collection has its own unique shimmer and stories to tell. We combine luxe amenities with the one-of-a-kind character of each destination through thoughtful design, fresh regional fare, and local insights so you can enjoy a vacation that’s both enriching and relaxing. Welcoming you is what we do best.
Hospitality Careers
Interested in joining the Opal Collection team? Visit our
careers page
to learn more about current openings across our 26 properties.
Sign up for our newsletter
Be the first to know about exclusive Opal Collection offers, openings, special events, and more.
Email
Sign Up
Additional terms and conditions
Find your perfect stay at Opal Collection
The Capitana
A boutique waterfront hotel ready to serve as your very own tropical sanctuary. Kick back and enjoy a casual island vibe with sweeping views of the bay cradled in a secluded, sandy lounge escape.
Learn more
end .swiper-slide
Opal Key Resort & Marina
Unwind on the vibrant waterfront of Old Town Key West. Just steps from Mallory Square and Duval street, Opal Key Resort & Marina is your haven among the excitement.
Learn more
end .swiper-slide
Sunset Key Cottages
In an exclusive enclave on a 27-acre island just 500 yards off Key West, Sunset Key Cottages offer a slice of secluded island living and resort activities to make the most of your luxe surroundings.
Learn more
end .swiper-slide
The Laureate
Luxury extended stay suites offer a coastal chic landing space and poolside lounging between Key West adventures.
Learn more
end .swiper-slide
end .swiper-wrapper
end .swiper-container
